text: @Liz_Cheney Predicted answers: 1a-they were. 1b- yes.  2. The WH inner circle in March when they were all in to COVID-19 denial. 3. WH tried get him to stop by pushing for Russia in G7.  Otherwise, pretend like it’s not true. After all the WH doesn’t trust our intelligence agencies.
